item.title: IDEA JRebel Plugin for Free
item.description: 0x00 Installing the JRebel plugin 0x01 Getting a license to activation from “https://my.jrebel.com". Just complete the registration,then u can get the Activation code. 0x02 Startup configuration Adding JRebel agent to your server or standalone application 0x03 Project configuration Mapping your workspace to the deployed application 0x04 Reload your code JRebel in action
